config.gravestones.title: Gravestones Configuration
config.gravestones.enable_item_loss.tool: Enable the item loss mechanic on death
config.gravestones.min_slots_lost_percen: Minimum percentage of occupied inventory slots to be affected by item loss (1-100)
config.gravestones.max_slots_lost_percen: Maximum percentage of occupied inventory slots to be affected by item loss (1-100)
config.gravestones.min_stack_loss_percen: Minimum percentage of items to lose from each affected stack (10-90)
config.gravestones.max_stack_loss_percen: Maximum percentage of items to lose from each affected stack (10-90)
config.gravestones.min_durability_loss_p: Minimum percentage of durability damage to apply to tools/armor (10-50)
config.gravestones.max_durability_loss_p: Maximum percentage of durability damage to apply to tools/armor (10-50)
config.gravestones.item_blacklist.toolti: Items that should never be lost on death (use registry names)
config.gravestones.affect_curios_items.t: Should items in curios slots be affected by item loss?
config.gravestones.protect_enchanted_ite: Should enchanted items have a lower chance of being lost?
config.gravestones.enchanted_item_protec: Reduction in loss chance for enchanted items (0-100)
config.gravestones.respect_curse_of_vani: Should items with Curse of Vanishing disappear completely on death?
config.gravestones.enable_curse_applicat: Enable randomly applying curses to enchanted items on death
config.gravestones.curse_application_cha: Chance to apply a curse to an enchanted item on death (0-100)
config.gravestones.available_curses.tool: List of curses that can be applied to items on death (use enchantment registry names)
